item.title: Are CDG Petchem Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: CDG Petchem Ltd's latest results show mixed performance, with improved profitability but a significant decline in net sales, which fell 49.91% year-on-year. While the company achieved its highest PBT and PAT in recent quarters, ongoing operational challenges remain evident. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Nitta Gelatin India Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Bearish Trend Ahead
item.description: Nitta Gelatin India Ltd has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting deteriorating momentum and long-term weakness in the stock’s price action. Time: 2 hours ago
